display_frame.description: Displays an OpenCV frame in a window. This function will show the provided frame and wait for a keypress. Press any key to close the window.

inputs.name: frame
inputs.description: The image or frame (as a NumPy array) to be displayed.

inputs.name: window_name
inputs.description: The name of the window in which the frame will be shown.

output.description: This function does not return a value; it displays a window on the screen.
